Recommendations

It is not yet known what government measures will apply during the Christmas holidays and to family visits.

We recommend following the basic hygiene rules (face mask, disinfecting hands, social distancing). Scheduling a meeting with a family member outside, such as arranging a Christmas walk, can also help to reduce the possibility of infection.

During meetings, it is advised not to serve food and cookies on large trays, but on individual plates. Special care is required when meeting people from high risk groups, such as the elderly.
